title: RAP BATTLES
body:
Hola Hola motherfuckers
It's the return of the king
Your sister still calls
Contact: hotline bling

I'm a bigger deal
Than a Jenner with Bulimia
More kills to my name
Than hunger and Leukemia

Even if you're unimpressed
By that KDA ratio
Your mother still returns
For my evening fellatio

"How vulgar", you cry
"How boorish and crass"
I'm just getting started
Wait for my critical mass

Accept no imposter,
No impecunious imitation
Now get down on your knees
I'm motherfucking Elo Satan

So pack your rabbit foot
And your four-leaf clover
They'll be left on your coffin
When this rap battle's over

WHO WANTS TO GET SERVED?

replies.body: With bars like this, you make Lil Wayne look like a God at rapping.
And you make Oscar Wilde look heterosexual, %%%got.
